ShortDescription.Value: Change zoning on any side of a road; use for placing new roads or updating existing roads.

Publish.LongDescription:
### Zone Tools Redux
- Change zoning along new roads or update existing roads. Enable zoning road sides for both/left/right/none. - Allows finer control of where buildings will spawn, as well as placing roads close together without overlapping/conflicting zones.
### New roads
- Open zone panel by clicking the button (top-left) or hotkey (default shift+Z) - Pre-select both, left, right, or none; moveable panel. - Draw a new road (note: vanilla has side depend on road draw direction).
### Update Existing Roads (UER):
- Open zoning panel (top-left button or hotkey) - Enable the **Update** button (recycle icon). Click again to turn off. - Select the side you want (both, left, right, none buttons). - Left click on roads to update zoning (supports click-and-drag to update many roads). - Left mouse applies the zone change. Select different icons to change. - New: right mouse click will also cycle the 4-zone options.
Power Trick: if you have existing roads and do not want a new road intersecting it to alter zoning, pick **None**, then draw the new road. Your existing road should keep zoning facing the same original direction you set.
## Options
- ✅ Auto open/close Zone Tools when road tools opens. - ✅ Protect occupied cells (buildings) - ✅ Protect zoned-but-empty cells - SHIFT+ Z open panel shortcut.
